The AccountFragment class handles the user interface for viewing and editing account details.

AccountView
AccountView is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture.
AdminAndUserFragment
AdminAndUserFragment class represents a fragment for a user who is an admin and some other user type.

A fragment to display a given event's information.
AdminFacilityFragment
A fragment to display a given facility's information.

AdminManageProfileTest
 
AdminProfileFragment
A fragment to display a given profile's information.
BrowseEventsArrayAdapter
This is an array adapter for the admin view for browsing events.
BrowseEventsFragment
BrowseEventsFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all events in the application.
BrowseFacilitiesArrayAdapter
This is an array adapter for the admin view for browsing facilities.
BrowseFacilitiesFragment
BrowseFacilitiesFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all facilities in the application.
BrowseProfilesArrayAdapter
This is an array adapter for the admin view for browsing user profiles.
BrowseProfilesFragment
BrowseProfilesFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all profiles in the application.
CameraFragment
CameraFragment class represents a fragment that provides camera functionality within the application.
CancelledListFragment
CancelledListFragment class represents a fragment that displays a list of users who have canceled their participation in a specific event.
CancelledListProfileFragment
A fragment to display and manage a user's profile information.
CreateAccountFragment
The CreateAccountFragment class handles creating user account when trying to join an event without an account
CreateAccountView
AccountView is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture.
CustomNotificationFragment
Fragment for sending custom notifications to users based on their status.
ElapsedTimeIdlingResource
 
EnrolledListFragment
EnrolledListFragment class represents a fragment for viewing user profiles enrolled in a specific event.
EnrolledListProfileFragment
EnrolledListProfileFragment class represents a fragment for viewing detailed information about an enrolled user.
EventController
Controller class for managing an EventModel instance.
EventFragment
Fragment for displaying and editing details of an event.
EventModel
EventModel represents an event in the application with attributes such as title, location, description, number of spots, event type, and poster image.
EventModelTest
 
EventsController
Controller class for managing a collection of events represented by the HomePageModel.
EventState
An enum for holding an event's state
EventView
EventView is responsible for observing changes in the EventModel and updating the corresponding EventFragment with the latest event details.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilityController
FacilityController is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture.
FacilityControllerTest
 
FacilityFragment
FacilityFragment class manages the facility details of the user in the application.
FacilityModel
A model class that stores information about a given Facility.
FacilityModelTest
 
FacilityView
FacilityView is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture.
FirebaseStorageHelper
Helper class for uploading images to Firebase Storage and updating user profile information in Firestore.
FirestoreHelper
Helper class for doing common operations with our Firestore databse.
HomeFragment
HomeFragment class displays the user's events and allows the user to add new events.
HomePageModel
Model class for managing a collection of events.
HomePageModel.EventFetchCallback
Callback interface for fetching event documents.
HomePageModel.MyEventsCallback
Callback interface for retrieving the current user's events.
HomeTab
This creates the tab at the top of the home page for switching between created events and joined events
JoinedEventsFragment
JoinedEventsFragment class displays the events that the user has joined and allows interaction with them.
JoinEventFragment
Fragment that allows users to join or unjoin an event.
JoinEventTest
 
LocationManagerSingleton
Creates a singleton location manager that stores the current user's location permissions
MainActivity
MainActivity is the entry point of the application that implements a bottom navigation bar for switching between different fragments such as Home, Camera, and Account.
ManageProfileTest
 
MapFragment
A Fragment that displays a map with coordinates from Firestore sign-ups.
MyApp
 
NotificationHelper
Helper class to manage sending notifications in the app.
OrganizerEventFragment
OrganizerEventFragment inflates the screen for organizers to manage a specific event of theirs.
PermissionHandler
 
QrCodeModel
QrCodeModel class provides methods to generate a QR code image and create a SHA-256 hash.
QrCodeModelTest
 
QrFragment
QrFragment is a fragment class that displays a QR code image.
QrFragmentTest
 
UserModel
UserModel is the data model representing a user in the application.
UserModelTest
 
ViewPagerAdapter
Adapter class for managing fragments in a ViewPager2.
WaitingListFragment
A fragment that displays a list of users who are waiting for an event.
WaitingListProfileFragment
A fragment that displays the profile details of a user who is waiting for an event, including their name, email, phone, roles, and profile image.
WinnerListFragment
A fragment that displays the list of winners for a specific event.
WinnerListProfileFragment
A fragment to display a given profile's information.
